code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setIsScrolled(window.scrollY>50);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:`header ${isScrolled?'header-scrolled':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text-main",children:"XPOSURE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text-sub",children:"COLLECTIVE"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#branding",className:"nav-link",children:"Branding"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#advertising",className:"nav-link",children:"Advertising"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#marketing",className:"nav-link",children:"Marketing"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-cta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Contact Us"})})]})]})})});};export default Header;
